original_text: Thus saith the Lord of hosts; It shall yet come to pass, that there shall come people, and the inhabitants of many cities:
korean_text: 만군의 여호와가 이와 같이 말하노라 다시 여러 백성과 많은 성읍의 주민이 올 것이라

sentences.original_text: Thus saith the Lord of hosts;
It shall yet come to pass,
and the inhabitants of many cities:
